short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the energy and excitement of Fortnite to your browser with the Fortnite Theme!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perfect for gamers and fans of the iconic battle royale experience, this theme not only transforms your new tab into a dynamic Fortnite-inspired space but also enhances your browsing experience with practical tools designed to boost your productivity.

With the shortcuts feature, you can quickly access your favorite websites in just one click. Whether it's gaming forums, streaming platforms, or social media, everything you need is easily reachable, saving you time and keeping you focused.

Stay on top of your day with the time and date display, seamlessly integrated into your new tab to help you manage your schedule while enjoying stunning Fortnite visuals. The bookmark feature ensures your frequently visited pages are just a click away, keeping your online experience streamlined and organized.

Need to jot down strategies, reminders, or quick notes? The notes feature is there for you. Capture your thoughts and ideas directly in your browser, with your notes securely stored and always accessible when you need them.

To keep things fresh, the theme switching option offers a variety of Fortnite-themed backgrounds. From vibrant battle scenes to iconic Fortnite characters, each new tab brings a unique visual experience, immersing you in the world of Fortnite every time you browse.

Whether you're a dedicated Fortnite player or someone who appreciates vibrant, action-packed aesthetics, the Fortnite Theme combines fun and functionality. Install it today and take your browsing to the next level with Fortniteâ€™s adventurous spirit and practical tools that keep you engaged and organized!
